availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, druggist. New York native. Married to Victoria Kline. Father of William P. C. Kline. Druggist in Warren County in 1860 and 1864. Owned one enslaved person in Warren County, in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No. 1, p. 162. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No. 1, p. 42. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Warren County, KY, February 1864, p. 195, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
